body: Page 2:…aren’t those Shirou Emiya’s clothes the Goblin Slayer’s wearing? If so……why?
I know it's a good comic when I can find humor in it
I will summon the doomslayer and give him a quest to kill all those gods responsible for that last part
story's a little hard to follow, but somehow my dick knew the way
So basically... That was still about slaying goblins, because he did it with them bc he couldn't concentrate on killing them... God he's a thickheaded op MC
If we overlook the lack of the sword maiden in this one. This is definitely top tier 😎
“Something came up I need your help” bruh I can’t 😂
Never thought I would ever see genderswapped Goblin Slayer but I did. No complaints.

Completely forgot to comment on this one but anyways. The story goes along pretty smoothly and so is the art, like said all the damn girls in goblin slayer somehow got the hots for the dude that says nothing but "SOKA" and kills goblins but i digress, dude sometimes can be a badass who knows, i'd give it that the arch that cowgirl was doing on page 13 was amazing and if we got a backshot of that it would be therapeutic. The extras with the 3 other girls were good as hell too, though I didn't see much of them in the manga as much as our main heroines if I can call them that, The sex scenes are great and like I've said before the art is great too. In conclusion, Menyoujan don't miss
